name: Headband of Alluring Charisma
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Wondrous Items/Headband of Alluring Charisma

sections.body: This attractive silver headband is decorated with a number of small red and orange gemstones. The headband grants the wearer an enhancement bonus to Charisma of +2, +4, or +6. Treat this as a temporary ability bonus for the first 24 hours the headband is worn.
sections.name: Description
